job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We're looking for a developer to join our new team. This team is working on a product that utilizes generative AI technology to support healthcare providers in their logistical processes.

   Your main challenge is to collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product. You will work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes. In doing so, you may need to be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery. Based on user testing, we then iteratively improve these prototypes. We are seeking someone with backend and API development experience who likes to go the extra mile. We are looking for curiosity, problem-solving skills, and the willingness to learn and implement new technologies.
   Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.

   Your team
   Your team is a multidisciplinary product team within the Data Science group. The team consists of a UX designer/researcher and software developers with various specializations. You will be building a new product from scratch, where the team itself is responsible for using an iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents to support healthcare workers with logistical challenges. In the long term, the experiences and insights gained from this product will form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products. You can also apply your knowledge more broadly within the Data Science group, allowing you to contribute not only to exploratory work but also to improving or expanding existing solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Software Developer

We're looking for a developer to join our new team. This team is working on a product that utilizes generative AI technology to support healthcare providers in their logistical processes.

   Your main challenge is to collaborate with the team to translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product. You will work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes. In doing so, you may need to be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery. Based on user testing, we then iteratively improve these prototypes. We are seeking someone with backend and API development experience who likes to go the extra mile. We are looking for curiosity, problem-solving skills, and the willingness to learn and implement new technologies.
   Depending on your experience, a combination with a more leadership role within the new team is also a possibility.

   Your team
   Your team is a multidisciplinary product team within the Data Science group. The team consists of a UX designer/researcher and software developers with various specializations. You will be building a new product from scratch, where the team itself is responsible for using an iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents to support healthcare workers with logistical challenges. In the long term, the experiences and insights gained from this product will form the foundation for the application of these advanced technologies across all of our products. You can also apply your knowledge more broadly within the Data Science group, allowing you to contribute not only to exploratory work but also to improving or expanding existing solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development of a product utilizing generative AI technology, specifically mentioning conversational agents and leveraging new technologies like generative AI. The core responsibilities involve translating these technologies into a user-friendly product, developing prototypes, and iteratively improving them based on user testing. This aligns strongly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer who focuses on designing, developing, and deploying applications built on generative models, including building user-facing software systems and working with frameworks for AI applications.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves backend and API development, collaborating with a UX designer and front-end developer to develop prototypes, and building a new product from scratch. This directly relates to traditional software engineering tasks for building and integrating AI features into applications.
The description mentions 'quickly develop prototypes' and 'iteratively improve these prototypes' based on user testing, which are core software development activities.
The phrase 'building a new product from scratch' indicates a significant software development effort.
job_tasks.phrase: building a new product from scratch

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly states the product 'utilizes generative AI technology' and the team is responsible for 'how to leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents'. This points to direct work with generative AI models.
The mention of 'conversational agents' implies working with or developing systems that interact using natural language, a key area for generative AI.

The role involves supporting 'healthcare providers in their logistical processes' and understanding how to leverage technologies to 'support healthcare workers with logistical challenges', indicating a need to understand the business context.
job_tasks.phrase: support healthcare providers in their logistical processes

job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly 'MLOps', the iterative development, prototyping, and improvement of a new product from scratch within a data science group, with the goal of long-term application, suggests operational considerations for deployment and maintenance.
job_tasks.phrase: iterative, exploratory process to discover how to leverage new technologies

soft_skills.phrase: willingness to learn and implement new technologies
